TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttributeCollection extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对 ASP.NET 服务器控件元素的开始标记中声明的所有特性的对象模型访问。

span.span: Provides object-model access to all attributes declared in the opening tag of an ASP.NET server control element.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回集合中的各个项对象作为其值。Individual items in the collection return a object as their value. 如果集合没有属性项，则该集合返回`null`。If there are no attribute items in the collection, the collection returns `null`. HTML 服务器控件的属性是以编程方式可通过属性，它继承的所有 HTML 服务器控件。Attributes on an HTML server control are programmatically available through the property, which is inherited by all HTML server controls. ASP.NET 公开为这些控件的属性的 HTML 服务器控件的属性。ASP.NET exposes attributes of HTML server controls as properties of those controls. 可以将属性添加到 Web 服务器控件通过属性，由所有 Web 服务器控件继承。You can add attributes to a Web server control through the property, which is inherited by all Web server controls. Web 服务器控件的属性集合中的属性不一定对应于该控件的控件的强类型属性。The attributes in the attributes collection for a Web server control do not necessarily correspond to the control's strongly typed properties for that control. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新对象，它名为`myAttributeCollection`，然后检查是否有已发布页面后。The following example creates a new object that is named `myAttributeCollection`, and then checks whether the page has been posted back. 如果没有，代码会将两个属性添加到集合。If it has not, the code adds two attributes to the collection. 然后，获取集合中的属性的数目，并循环访问集合，该密钥写入到页面的每个属性。It then gets the number of attributes in the collection and iterates through the collection, writing the key to each attribute to the page. 如果页是回发，代码获取新的属性数并循环访问集合，向页面中写入的键和值的每个属性。If the page is a postback, the code gets the new number of attributes and iterates through the collection, writing the key and value of each attribute to the page. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/CS/attributecollection_attributecollection.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/VB/attributecollection_attributecollection.vb.aspx#1)]

The attribute value.

summary.span: 将特性添加到服务器控件的 对象。

span.span: Adds an attribute to a server control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在字符串`value`参数包含与号 (&)、 字符自动编码。If the string in the `value` parameter contains an ampersand (&), the character is automatically encoded. 生成 HTML 表示形式是"&"。The resulting HTML representation is "&". ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以编程方式将属性添加到 ASP.NET 服务器控件对象。The following example shows how to use the method to programmatically add an attribute to an ASP.NET server control object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Add Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Add Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddAttributes(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed

param.name: writer
param.span: 实例，它将这些特性写入 ASP.NET 服务器控件的开始标记中。

span.span: An instance that writes the attribute to the opening tag of an ASP.NET server control.

summary.span: 将特性从 类添加到 对象中，该对象负责将这些特性以标记形式呈现。

span.span: Adds attributes from the class to the object that is responsible for rendering the attributes as markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会复制到的所有服务器控件的特性对象，以便它们可以通过下一步调用呈现方法。This method copies all the server control's attributes to an object so that they can be rendered by the next call to the method. 如其他控件中包含的控件和，也许可以通过直接呈现所包含的控件来提高性能。For controls that are contained in other controls such as and , you can potentially improve performance by rendering the contained controls directly. 直接呈现会比因为容器控件要求将子控件的所有属性都复制到容器控件，并呈现其复制后，通过容器控件呈现速度更快。Rendering directly can be faster than rendering through the container control because container controls require that you copy all the child control attributes to the container control and render them after they are copied. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将添加到新属性名为的服务器控件`myButton`和一个服务器控件名为`myTextBox`。The following example shows how to add new attributes to a server control named `myButton` and a server control named `myTextBox`. 然后将这些属性添加到自定义将每个这些控件向输出流写入这些属性的对象。It then adds those attributes to a custom object that will write those attributes to an output stream for each of those controls. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_Item/CS/attributecollection_item.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_Item/VB/attributecollection_item.vb.aspx#1)]

[!code-csharp[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/CS/attributecollection_attributecollection.cs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/VB/attributecollection_attributecollection.vb.aspx#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CssStyle As CssStyleCollection
public: property System::Web::UI::CssStyleCollection ^ CssStyle { System::Web::UI::CssStyleCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 对象所属的 ASP.NET 服务器控件的样式的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of styles for the ASP.NET server control to which the current object belongs.

value.span: 一个包含当前服务器控件样式的集合。

span.span: A collection that contains the styles for the current server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于特定的 HTML 服务器控件添加到声明的任何样式对象分析包含 ASP.NET Web 页时。Any style declared for a particular HTML server control is added to the object when the containing ASP.NET Web page is parsed. 此属性可用于添加、 删除和循环访问声明为服务器控件的样式。You can use this property to add, remove, and iterate through the styles declared for the server control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 CSS 样式值以编程方式添加到服务器控件的对象。The following example shows how to add a CSS style value programmatically to a server control's object. 单击按钮时，背景色名为的服务器控件`TextBox1`设置为中的选定项服务器控件名为`DropDownList1`。When a button is clicked, the background color of a server control named `TextBox1` is set to the selected item in a server control named `DropDownList1`. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection_CssStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_CssStyle/CS/attributecollection_cssstyle.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection_CssStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_CssStyle/VB/attributecollection_cssstyle.vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The object instance to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 确定 对象的当前实例是否等于指定的对象。

span.span: Determines whether the current instance of the object is equal to the specified object.

returns.span: 如果包含在 参数中的对象等于 的当前实例，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object that is contained in the parameter is equal to the current instance of ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相等比较的对象，必须满足以下条件：For the compared objects to be equal, they must meet the following criteria: - 中包含的对象`o`参数必须是对象。The object that is contained in the `o` parameter must be an object. - 这两个集合必须包含相同数目的项。Both collections must contain the same number of items. - 在这两个集合中每个条目的键值必须与匹配。The key value of each entry in both collections must match. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以添加到属性或检索来自 ASP.NET 服务器控件使用此属性。You can add an attribute to or retrieve one from an ASP.NET server control that uses this property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置动态 HTML`onblur`属性来运行 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 命令时Web 服务器控件失去焦点。The following example shows how to set a dynamic HTML `onblur` attribute to run an ECMAScript (JavaScript) command when a Web server control loses focus. summary.span: 获取服务器控件的 对象中所有特性的键集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of keys to all attributes in the server control's object.
The collection of keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含中的所有键的 ASP.NET 服务器控件，是否添加它们以编程方式与方法，或以声明方式。This property contains all the keys that are in the of an ASP.NET server control, whether you have added them programmatically with the method, or declaratively. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问的属性对象服务器控件。The following example shows how to iterate through the property of the object for an server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Keys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Keys Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Keys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Keys Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 从服务器控件的 对象中移除一个特性。

span.span: Removes an attribute from a server control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对象不包含具有指定的特性`key`，集合保持不变。If the object does not contain an attribute that has the specified `key`, the collection remains unchanged. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式从 HTML 服务器控件中删除属性对象。The following example shows how to programmatically remove an attribute from an HTML server control's object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Remove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Remove Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Remove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Remove Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

param.name: writer
param.span: 将特性集合写入当前输出流的 实例。

span.span: An instance that writes the attribute collection to the current output stream.

summary.span: 将特性集合写入该集合所属的控件的指定 输出流。

span.span: Writes the collection of attributes to the specified output stream for the control to which the collection belongs.

remarks.format: ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何从继承类，以创建一个名为的自定义控件`AttribRender`重写方法。The first code example shows how to inherit from the class to create a custom control named `AttribRender` that overrides the method. 第二个代码示例演示如何在 ASP.NET 网页中使用自定义控件。The second code example shows how to use the custom control in an ASP.NET Web page. 下面的示例演示如何创建一个名为的自定义控件`AttribRender`重写方法类，而无需调用基类的方法。The following example shows how to create a custom control named `AttribRender` that overrides the method of the class without calling the method of the base class. 相反，`AttribRender`调用方法。Instead, `AttribRender` invokes the method. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1/CS/attributecollection_render.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1/VB/attributecollection_render.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用`AttribRender`在网页中的自定义控件。The following example shows how to use the `AttribRender` custom control in a Web page. 它假定自定义控件的代码文件是在应用程序的 App_Code 文件夹中。It assumes that the code file for the custom control is in the App_Code folder for the application. [!code-aspx-csharp[AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1/CS/attributecollection_rendercs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1/VB/attributecollection_rendervb.aspx#2)]
